snippet.title: OBJECTS IN SPACE: Developer Playthrough - Ship Operations & Contracts
snippet.description:
Objects in Space is an open world 2D stealth-action space trading game. In this video, the developers talk through a basic A to B contract hauling Oxygen from Lago Gas Port to Penitent Commercial in the Leo Star System.

We go in depth into how the ship's bridge and systems work, how to identify other ships from your nav map and sensor array and talk about the open world itself.

This video is timed to go up at the same time as the announcement of our 21 June Early Access release date and of our limited Beta happening in late May.

Sign up for the beta here: https://goo.gl/forms/voce1IGrAwzrEQQp1

We hope you enjoy it!
